name: Treasure-Seeking Seelie
title: Revelation's Potential: Treasure-Seeking Seelie
desc: Strange Seelie capable of guiding people toward treasure. Legend has it that some individuals know how to communicate with these Seelie...

skills.desc: After your character uses a skill: This card will accumulate 1 Treasure Clue.If this card has stored 3 Treasure Clues, then discard this card and draw 3 cards.
